user_stories.description: As a user, I want to register with email and password
As a user, I want to login with my credentials
user_stories.code_evidence: UserManager class in auth.py handles user login.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password if forgotten
As an admin, I want to manage user accounts

functional_requirements.code_evidence: Hashing is mentioned but not implemented securely.

functional_requirements.description: Input validation to prevent SQL injection
functional_requirements.code_evidence: SQL injection vulnerability present in setup_database.

security_requirements.code_evidence: Hardcoded credentials found in multiple files.

security_requirements.description: Input sanitization for all user inputs

security_requirements.code_evidence: Password hashing is mentioned but not implemented securely.

security_requirements.description: Protection against common vulnerabilities (SQLi, XSS, etc.)

comprehensive_analysis.executive_summary: The implementation shows significant gaps in user story and functional requirement coverage, with critical security vulnerabilities present. Immediate attention is required to address hardcoded credentials and SQL injection risks.

actionable_improvement_plans.short_term: Remove hardcoded credentials and implement input validation.
actionable_improvement_plans.medium_term: Develop user registration and password reset functionalities.
actionable_improvement_plans.long_term: Implement a comprehensive security framework including JWT authentication and secure password storage.

user_stories: As a user, I want to register with email and password
As a user, I want to login with my credentials
As a user, I want to reset my password if forgotten
As an admin, I want to manage user accounts
functional_requirements: Input validation to prevent SQL injection
security_requirements: Input sanitization for all user inputs
Protection against common vulnerabilities (SQLi, XSS, etc.)
